definition: lower form of animal life, including insects, insect larvae, worms and similar creatures/CL:條|条[tiao2],隻|只[zhi1]/(fig.) person with a particular undesirable characteristic

pinyin: shu3 zao3 xing2 ban1 zhen3 shang1 han2

sentences.english: The highest incidence of cases occurs during the summer months when rats and their fleas are most active and abundant.
sentences.chinese: 夏季老鼠及鼠蚤活跃并大量繁殖，为该病的高发期。

sentences.english: Conclusion Species and distribution of fleas in Zhangjiakou were given.
sentences.chinese: 结论基本掌握了张家口市蚤的种类及其分布。

sentences.english: The main flea was xenopsylla cheopis.

sentences.chinese: 典型的例子就是这个海鞘类砂海星属体蚤。

sentences.english: Does it kill ticks as well as fleas?
sentences.chinese: 灭虱与灭蚤的效果是否相同？

sentences.english: Flea bites can cause a person to develop a rash known as fleabite dermatitis.
sentences.chinese: 人被叮咬了之后可能会患上蚤咬型红斑。

sentences.english: Objective Grasps Ischnopsylla (Hexactenopsylla) hexactenus in China distributed condition .
sentences.chinese: 目的掌握六栉蝠蚤在中国的分布状况。

sentences.english: This paper reports the flea fauna and the flea species in relation to plague in Yunnan Province.
sentences.chinese: 本文报告云南的蚤类区系和与鼠疫有关的蚤种。

sentences.english: This paper reports the flea fauna and the flea species in relation to plague in Yunnan Province.

sentences.english: Results The Inner Mongolian Chifeng has discovered Ischnopsylla (Hexactenopsylla) hexactenus .
sentences.chinese: 结果内蒙古赤峰市发现了六栉蝠蚤。

sentences.english: Trophic niche of flea in the southern slope of the Himalaya Mountains.
sentences.chinese: 喜马拉雅山南坡蚤类营养生态位的研究。

sentences.english: Objective To study species and distribution of fleas in Zhangjiakou.
sentences.chinese: 目的研究张家口市蚤的种类及其分布。

sentences.english: One is the South American phorid fly. It lays its eggs on fire ants.
sentences.chinese: 一种南美蚤蝇，它将它的蛋生在火蚁上。

sentences.english: Or it could be something less physically demanding, such as needlepoint or crochet.
sentences.chinese: 或者可以少一些体力劳动，如针尖或蚤。

sentences.english: Objective To understand the population composition and seasonal fluctuation of fleas parasitized on Rattus tanezumi in Leizhou city.
sentences.chinese: 目的了解雷州市黄胸鼠鼠体蚤的种群构成及消长。
